item.title: Making smithing work
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

i am using a blue scape source
all of the smithing deals players with money for their bars

I want to make elemental bars smith selected armour which i want to be able to make
i looked at the smithing script and would like some help in making one

smithing interface is 994
i want to be able to make that appear and smith like the good old daysâ€¦ can anyone help me out please i really want to add this =P

if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2349 && playerHasItem(2347)){ deleteItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 150); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); }
that is what i have in now for making bars into money

Read full topic
